extendedInfo.description: Mobile Grid Client is a Second Life (SL) and Open Simulator (OpenSim) messaging client/viewer with local chat, IM, group chat, people search, mini map, the ability to teleport, inventory support and more.The unique client-server architecture of Mobile Grid Client keeps you connected to the grid all the time, even when your phone is in standby and keeps the traffic low.Visit our website for more information.PLEASE NOTE:The first 14 days of usage are free.After then you have to PAY A MONTHLY FEE (starting at L$250) for usage. The fee is NOT recurring and Mobile Grid Client will always ask you before charging your account.Mobile Grid Client is not an official Second Life viewer/client from Linden Lab and is not provided or supported by Linden Lab, the makers of Second Life.

reviews.title: Great app; more updates would be nice
reviews.comment: Solid app for text chatting in SL. Stable and runs great. Also has nice features like being able to send money and view note cards.   I first started to use this app in the summer of 2010. My only complaint is that I would expect more frequent updates with new features, especially for an app that charges a monthly fee.  Being able to view textures would be awesome.

reviews.title: Still the best solution...
reviews.comment: Yes it has a monthly fee.. yes the \"other\" app does not.  This app will NOT eat your battery 2 hours! This app doesn\'t also flood your notification bar every time someone says something in local.  That side, there are some oddities I\'ve noticed with JB 4.2.   The app will randomly close or is killed and i\'m not running any \'task killer\'.

reviews.title: Switched to Lumiya
reviews.comment: I\'ve switched to Lumiya, a great app for SL with actual 3D and avatar rendering for one-time $3.  This app works but no longer compares in function or pricing structure.
